Setup External Services for B2C Commerce


  1. From B2C Commerce you will need
    1. Client Id
    2. Client Secret
    3. Access Token Url
    4. Short code
  2. Setup an Auth Provider
    1. Select B2CAuthProvider as Type
    2. Name = B2C
    3. URL Suffix = B2C
    4. Access Token URL = https://account.demandware.com/dw/oauth2/access_token
    5. Auth Provider Name = B2C
    6. Callback Url = https://YOUR_DOMAIN.my.salesforce.com/services/authcallback/B2C
    7. Client Id = YOUR_CLIENT_ID
    8. Client Secret = YOUR_CLIENT_SECRET
    9. Scope = SALESFORCE_COMMERCE_API:XXXX_XXX sfcc.customerlists.rw
    10. Pick a user to execute as
  3. Setup a Named Credential referencing Auth Provider
    1. Label = B2C Commerce API
    2. Name = B2C_Commerce_API
    3. URL = https://{shortcode}.api.commercecloud.salesforce.com/customer/customers/v1
    4. Identity Type = Per User
    5. Authentication Protocol = Oauth 2.0
    6. Authentication Provider = What you created in step 2
    7. Scope = SALESFORCE_COMMERCE_API:XXXX_XXX sfcc.customerlists sfcc.customerlists.rw
    8. Generate Authorization Header is checked
  4. Check that the External Service is referencing Named Credential
  5. Update or create Flows using external service actions as desired. Included is a Contact Trigger to search B2C Commerce for matching customers.
